Class ChordNodeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • ChordNodeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChordNode, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ChordNodeImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ChordNode
    The standard chord node of the network,implements the ChordNode interface.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • find_predecessor

        public NodeInfo find_predecessor​(int id,
                                 Result result)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ChordNode
        This function is used to find the predecessor node for a given node id. Loop until the id is not in the range (nn, successor(nn)) at each iteration, update nn = nn.closest_preceding_finger(id) when loop ends, nn will be id's predecessor
        Specified by:
        find_predecessor in interface ChordNode
        Parameters:
        id - The node identifier whose predecessor is to be found
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection
        Returns:
        nn NodeInfo object containing details of predecessor node
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • init_finger_table

        public void init_finger_table​(NodeInfo n,
                              Result result)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ChordNode
        This function is called immediately after the join to initialize data structures specifically the finger table entries to assist in routing.Start by initializing the table. The (i+1)th finger table entry should be same as ith entry, if not invoke find_successor.Check if FTE needs to be updated to s, or it should continue pointing to me. Finally, set predecessor of successor as me.
        Specified by:
        init_finger_table in interface ChordNode
        Parameters:
        n - The successor node of the current Chord Node instance
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

                                      int i,
                                      NodeInfo s,
                                      Result result)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ChordNode
        This function is used to update the finger table entries of Chord nodes when a node leaves the network/ring

        Parameters:

        s - The NodeInfo object to be set as successor in the finger table entry

      • stabilize

        public void stabilize​(Result result)
        Description copied from interface: ChordNode
        The stabilize function is used to periodically verify the current nodes immediate successor and tell the successor about itself In case of exception a second chance is given to find the successor (Not a 3rd though).
        Specified by:
        stabilize in interface ChordNode

        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection

      • insert_key_local

        public boolean insert_key_local​(int keyID,
                                java.lang.String key,
                                java.lang.String value,
                                Result result)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ChordNode
        Function to insert key value pair in current Chord Node instance. Reasons to move to query the ring again for this key: -keyID does not lie in my range. -Maybe ring topology has changed while this request was routed to me.
        Specified by:
        insert_key_local in interface ChordNode
        Parameters:

        value - Value associated to the key

        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • get_key_local

        public java.lang.String get_key_local​(int keyID,
                                      java.lang.String key,
                                      Result result)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ChordNode
        Function to relieve key value pair in current Chord Node instance Reasons to move to query the ring again for this key: Key does not lie in my range. Maybe the key migrated due to a recent node join, and this is an old query that has reached me late.
        Specified by:
        get_key_local in interface ChordNode
        Parameters:
        keyID - Hashed valued for the key
        key - Key to be retrieved
        result - result object to assist in metric collection
        Returns:
        boolean Indicator to check if operation was successful or not
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • leave_ring

        public boolean leave_ring​(Result result)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ChordNode
        This function is called when a Chord Node leaves the ring Order of operations when a node leaves the ring: 1) Migrate keys to successor. 2) Inform successor. 3) Inform predecessor. 4) Inform bootstrap. 5) Inform other nodes. Note: Any key-related requests that are routed to this node between steps (1) and (3) will fail.
        Specified by:
        leave_ring in interface ChordNode
        Parameters:
        result - result object to assist in metric collection
        Returns:
        boolean Status of leave operation
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • generate_ID

        public int generate_ID​(java.lang.String key,
                       int maxNodes)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                       java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Description copied from interface: ChordNode
        This function is used to generate a unique identifier for a key using SHA-1 algorithm
        Specified by:
        generate_ID in interface ChordNode
        Parameters:
        key - Key for which identifier is to be generated
        maxNodes - Maximum no of nodes in the Chord ring
        Returns:
        int unique identifier for the key
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Due to SHA-1 usage.
